tone_and_atmosphere.title: Tone & Atmosphere
content: Bleak, morally gray world corrupted by horror
Dread builds in an already hopeless setting
Cynicism meets existential terror
The horrible is made worse by human cruelty
Violation of what little safety remains
Hope is crushed by both horror and harsh reality
Dark humor emerges from grotesque absurdity

pacing.title: Pacing
content: Grinding tension punctuated by horror
Slow build of dread in already grim circumstances
Let characters suffer consequences of both horror and pragmatism
No rushing past weight of terrible choices
Horror escalates in a world already brutal
Recovery periods only reveal more bleakness
Pacing reflects exhausting struggle against darkness

dialogue_style.title: Dialogue Style
content: Cynical, world-weary speech about terrible things
Gallows humor about horror and suffering
Characters say cruel truths about dark reality
Denial breaks down into grim acceptance
Pragmatism about horrific circumstances
Speech fragments under both fear and despair
No heroic speeches, only bitter observations

scene_construction.title: Scene Construction
content: Horror violates an already compromised world
Moral compromises made in face of supernatural threat
Realistic consequences for both horror and violence
Characters can fail catastrophically in multiple ways
Horror is made more terrible by human evil
No clean victories over either darkness
Small mercies stand out against compounded darkness

descriptive_focus.title: Descriptive Focus
content: Visceral descriptions of horror and brutality
Grim environmental details (decay, corruption, wrongness)
Physical and psychological toll of combined threats
Sensory details that create both horror and harshness
Contrast between natural brutality and supernatural horror
Settings reflect both moral and physical corruption
Body horror and realistic violence intertwined

common_pitfalls.title: Common Pitfalls to Avoid
content: Don't be dark just for shock value
Avoid making everything meaninglessly bleak
Don't forget dark humor element
Resist making horror cartoonish in grim setting
Don't lose horror atmosphere in grim pragmatism
Avoid confusing grimdark horror with pure nihilism
Don't desensitize through constant brutality
